clues.text: The Cincinnati Reds won the World Series over this team that later was found to have lost intentionally

(Sarah of the Clue Crew shows TRAPPIST-1 on the monitor.) 39 light-years from our sun, a red dwarf star called TRAPPIST-1 has 7 Earth-size these whose orbits are seen here; JPL says3 of themare firmly in the habitable zone where liquid water could most likely exist
